bike.description: S-Works SL4 FACT 11r carbon, FACT construction, tapered/shaped headtube, compact race design, 1-3/8" lower headset bearing, carbon OSBB

components.description: S-Works Tarmac FACT carbon full monocoque, OS race for 1-3/8" bearing, hollow carbon dropouts
1-1/8" upper and 1-3/8" lower, hybrid cartridge lightweight bearings, 8mm carbon cone spacer, w/ 20mm of carbon spacers
OS integrated, CeramicSpeed, sealed ceramic bearings
